snippet: Both officers, who were responding to a report of shots being fired in August, said the youth turned around and pointed a gun at them before they fired a combined 15 shots.
lead_paragraph: Both officers, who were responding to a report of shots being fired in August, said the youth turned around and pointed a gun at them before they fired a combined 15 shots.

headline.main: No Charges Against Officers Who Shot Boy, 14, in Trenton Chase
